text: Anthony Beanland (born 11 January 1944) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender. He made appearances in the English Football League for Southport, Southend United, Wrexham and Bradford Park Avenue. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Bradford Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Southport F.C. players Category:Southend United F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Knowsley United F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:English Football League players
title: Tony Beanland
